subject: Re: Welcome to the Family!

full_threads.body:
Hi Leila,

Thank you for signing up : ) 

Here is the process moving forward: 

  1. Today we will create a clone of both websites. We will work on them to make sure they are safe, running available updates and as fast as they can be. 
  2. Next we will send you the temporary links to view the improved websites. You can then approve us to make them live. At this point we will also provide you with the improvements we have made.
  3. Once the sites are live, you can let us know the changes or updates you would like by emailing us at support@wpperk.com 
Regarding your questions: 

Are we going to have a meeting to discuss below
***We can have a phone call if you like, or you are welcome to come to our offices on George Street (near the Apple Store)

Are you going to analyse current websites status and give us advises of improvement? how is the speed right now , and how fast will improve?
***Absolutely, we are working on this today. Generally it takes up to 48hrs. We will benchmark the speed and show you the improvements. We never know how much it will improve by until we start and have a look what condition the site is in.

are we going to set up a goal and details to improve websites, and you will explain the services and features? what is the 2 hours of developing?
***You will receive a monthly report with a breakdown of the websites key metrics. These can be tracked month-on-month. The 2 hours of developer time can be used for content updates on the website, adding features or meetings.

What you will do with the SEO optimize?
***The speed gains and security setup will help with your SEO. DigitalMaas can do more aggressive SEO and keyword targeting for you, I can talk to you about this further if required.

And how we work together and communication efficiently in the further?
***Emails to support@wpperk.com are best. Try to be as specific as possible so that we can best serve you.

And what you can do with our mailchimp? currently we have a mailchimp account in use.but it's looks not link with the website.
***We will take a look at this setup for you. Can you please provide us your logins?

I have also

Hi Heath

I ordered the pro plan for below 2 website
www.lacosmetique.com.au
www.toocoolforschool.net.au

Are we going to have a meeting to discuss below
Are you going to analyse current websites status and give us advises of improvement? how is the speed right now , and how fast will improve?
are we going to set up a goal and details to improve websites, and you will explain the services and features? what is the 2 hours of developing?
What you will do with the SEO optimize?
And how we work together and communication efficiently in the further?
And what you can do with our mailchimp? currently we have a mailchimp account in use.but it's looks not link with the website.

I am looking forward to hear from you soon.

Best regards

Leila

Hi leila,

I wanted to personally reach out to let you know how pleased we are to welcome you WP Perk!

We like to keep things super simple, so if you ever need to contact our team for support, you can either:

  • Send an email to support@wpperk.com
  • Jump onto our website - wpperk.com and use the live chat
  • Call us on 1300 072 134 (within Australia) or +61 1300 072 134 (outside of Australia)

All of our communications will be added to the support page within your account. We recommend you familiarise yourself with this.

So let's get started! Please head to https://wpperk.com/onboard/ to fill out our quick onboarding form.

If you need any help during this process, feel free to let us know.

Once we have your logins, we will migrate your site over to our servers, run our WordPress optimisation tweaks and test the performance. We will send you an email once your site is ready for you to triple check.

On the 1st of each month, you will receive a report with the key website metrics and can feel free to ask us to make any content changes, functionality enhancements or request some advice. If you have signed up for a Professional plan, you have 2 hours of devloper time each month included your package. If any tasks will take you over this limit, we will let you know before commencing and advise of any additional fees.

Thanks once again and we look forward to seeing the better version of your website come to life.

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
